name: Dizzy: Prince of the Yolkfolk
description:
Dizzy: Prince of the Yolkfolk is an arcade game developed by The Big Red Software Company and Slam Productions. It was originally released in 1993. It was published by Codemasters. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Dizzy: Prince of the Yolkfolk on PC.
It was scored by Allister Brimble.
